name: Companion "Bot 1.0"
description:
Companion "Bot 1.0" is a fun puzzle game with your companion bot. Going around charging, opening gates and WINNING. In this game you play as a ghost and place bolts for your companion bot friend to find. He can be a bit annoying and dumb sometimes-

Breeze or struggle through 10 hand crafted levels, press all the buttons, have your robot companion run straight into enemies, and open gates. 

- Loading time is a bit slow! -

CONTROLS *mentioned in level 1*:

Left Mouse ButtonSet ghost target positionRight Mouse ButtonPlace bolt *Must be near the ghost*

How things work:

If the companion bot has enough power:

The companion bot will move towards the NEAREST bolt, not including travel distance

If the companion bot doesn't have enough power:

The companion bot will move towards the NEAREST charging station, not including travel distance at that time, locking the target until the bot is charged
